name: neo4j
description: Neo4j is an open source Graph Database. It allows you to efficiently manage highly connected data. This DC/OS package is about the Neo4j core cluster servers, core servers' main responsibility is to safeguard data. You can access the cluster via officially supported drivers from most languages. Installation documentation can be found at https://github.com/dcos/examples/tree/master/1.8/neo4j
preInstallNotes: This DC/OS Service is currently EXPERIMENTAL. There may be bugs, incomplete features, incorrect documentation, or other discrepancies. The default configuration requires at least 3 nodes having 6 CPU, 24GB of memory and 24GB of persistent disk storage in total. Default credentials are neo4j/dcos. Please change them on first use.
postInstallNotes:
Neo4j has been successfully installed.
Documentation can be found at https://neo4j.com/docs and https://neo4j.com/developer
